code: import React from'react';import{Card,CardContent,CardMedia,Typography,LinearProgress,Box}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PokemonCard=_ref=>{let{pokemon}=_ref;const stats=['hp','attack','defense','speed'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",height:"200",image:pokemon.imageUrl,alt:pokemon.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{gutterBottom:true,variant:"h5",component:"div",children:pokemon.name}),stats.map(stat=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"text.secondary",children:stat.toUpperCase()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinearProgress,{variant:"determinate",value:Number(pokemon[stat])/100*100})]},stat))]})]});};export default PokemonCard;
